text: The National Congress of Nicaragua (Congreso Nacional) was the legislature of Nicaragua before the Sandinista revolution of 1979.https://geographic.org/wfb1982/worldfactbook82natiilli.pdf The congress was bicameral, and consisted of Chamber of Deputies (Cámara de Diputados) and Senate (Cámara del Senado). ==Presidents of the Chamber of Deputies before 1979== {| class="wikitable" !
